helper.brief: Using UXP SQL to store data

file.name: 1-C_samples/sample_workflow_sql.c
file.description: This program shows how you can utilize UXP SQL using a Sertainty ID and add data files into the created UXP file.

file.description: Defines a complete id, including rules and the user SampleUser@myemail.com
